Name: Neal's Barbados Cosmopolitan
Ingredients: 37.5 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist (flamed).
EXPRESS flamed orange zest twist over cocktail, then use as garnish.
Review: Your standard Cosmopolitan made more compelling by a slug of warming Caribbean spirit.
History: Created in 1985 by Neal Murray at Fog City Diner in San Francisco, USA. This cocktail was added to the menu at BIX, San Francisco in 1988 and was still on the menu in 2006 when I first discovered this riff on a Cosmopolitan. See: Cosmopolitan cocktail history .
Nutrition: One serving of Neal's Barbados Cosmopolitan contains 156 calories
